paper_abstract: This report summarizes issues discussed at the first CONMI workshop held on 30 March 2005 in Boston, Massachusetts. Sponsored by the National Science Foundation's Office of Cyberinfrastructure (OCI-0532233), the workshop was intended to begin a discussion regarding the viability and utility of a community-oriented network measurement infrastructure. This report was published 20 December 2005 online at: http: //www.caida.org/workshops/ cortmi/.
paper_title: Community-oriented network measurement infrastructure (CONMI) workshop report
